message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your price and the value I believe the product is worth to me.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While I'm motivated to sell, I can't go as low as $10,500. Could you do $11,000?
I understand that you're motivated to sell, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Could you do $10,750? I think that's a fair compromise.
